subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Baseball

Athletics and Sports
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: An Ohio judge’s ruling declaring illegal the N.C.A.A.’s ban on agents has athletes and schools wondering what to do, especially as June’s amateur baseball draft approaches.
snippet: An Ohio judge’s ruling declaring illegal the N.C.A.A.’s ban on agents has athletes and schools wondering what to do, especially as June’s amateur baseball draft approaches.
